page.title: Slide Editor
page.description: An editable slide page where users can create, edit, and save their presentations.

slides_list.title: Welcome
slides_list.content: Click to add title and content.

editing: Title and text boxes are editable directly on the slide.
Supports basic formatting (bold, italic, lists, headings).
saving: Save button stores the slide title and content to localStorage under 'recentPresentations'.
Home page reads and displays these saved presentations dynamically.
navigation: Return Home button redirects to index.html.
New Slide adds a new editable slide layout.

instructions: Add a new 'Save' button in the toolbar next to 'Reset'.
Use localStorage to save presentations: store title, date, and content as an array named 'recentPresentations'.
Show a notification or brief animation when saving is successful.
Each slide should include two editable fields: a title box and a text box stacked vertically.
The editor must remain simple, clean, and responsive.
